In childhood I was curious and successful and often shone and wanted to gain information in every field
In childhood I was polite and neat and mostly played intellectual games like chess, Lego, intelligence games...
In adolescence I planned everything in advance and reached it with great persistence, and the most important goal for me was studying and winning, and I generally didn't get involved in side things
At school I usually sat in the front row of class and in the teacher's view
I was generally approved by family and school authorities and was a distinguished and excellent person
I have a plan and schedule for my life and stick to it
I'm a goal-oriented, hardworking and determined person who generally reaches my goals
When making important life choices I make choices with logical and rational thinking - what's in my interest, not necessarily what I like
Excellent job position is important to me and I always plan for material, professional and social achievements
I see people's weaknesses and use them if necessary
I've always respected social rules and regulations, even where there's no police, and never violate them, though others mockingly call me a goody-two-shoes
To do any work and use any tool, I first study the related instructions and act exactly according to them
I generally do my work perfectly and think I'm a head taller than the general public in terms of intelligence and management
I want to make a good impression on others, so I'm always polite, calm and very friendly with them
My friends are generally people of my own social and intellectual level

I'm a cautious person in social relationships, my connection with all friends and colleagues is clear and defined and I don't establish connections outside of that - I have clear boundaries for each relationship
I want to marry someone who is at my intellectual and social level
In marriage, I prefer respect to love
I haven't experienced deep love
Sex is not a mental preoccupation for me and I do this act with prior planning, and sometimes during the relationship I think about my work and life plans
I give advice to my children for solving problems as an informed and mature person
Others admire me for my successes

To believe any topic I refer to scientific and academic documents, and generally unproven scientific matters including metaphysics, intuition, I Ching, energy healing... are unacceptable and nonsense to me
I'm capable of budgeting, have savings and have stabilized my economic situation for the future
I'm happy when I'm first and most popular, everyone encourages me and sees my victories and I shine
